# Xperience by Kentico - Context7 MCP Documentation

[![Kentico Labs](https://img.shields.io/badge/Kentico_Labs-grey?labelColor=orange&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/Kentico/.github/blob/main/SUPPORT.md#labs-limited-support)

## Overview

This repository contains HTML documentation files for consumption by the Context7 MCP (Model Context Protocol) server. The repository serves as a public resource containing comprehensive Xperience by Kentico documentation that can be accessed by external tooling and automated systems.

### Repository Contents

- **Documentation** (`src/documentation/`) - Administration interface basics, business user guides, developer resources, and changelog information
- **Guides** (`src/guides/`) - Architecture guides, configuration instructions, customer journey documentation, development resources, and digital marketing materials

### Purpose

The repository is maintained as a public resource to enable:

- Context7 MCP server integration
- External tooling access to documentation
- Automated documentation processing and retrieval

**No user action required** - This repository is designed for automated consumption by the Context7 MCP server and other external systems.

## Usage

View the [Usage Guide](./docs/Usage-Guide.md) for detailed information about this repository's purpose and access.
